definitions.definition: A device used in film production, having hinged boards that are brought together with a clap , used at the start of each take of a motion picture or other video production to be able to synchronize picture and sound during editing.

main_definition: ( film ) A device used in film production, having hinged boards that are brought together with a clap , used at the start of each take of a motion picture or other video production to be able to synchronize picture and sound during editing.
